About

Is This Thing On

Hi, I am trying to make a website. Please visit the “Notes”, “Project”, or “Posts” section.

It actually has stuff. Enjoy your visit and browse around while me and construction dog get back to work.

Also, enjoy this silly website I made years ago when I got my start in physics research at UC Davis. Shoutout to Professor Manuel Calderon for being one of the greatest mentors I’ve been lucky enough to have.
